original_text: But they continued to speak strongly to him. They said, ‘He makes the people angry and ready to fight against the government. He has taught these bad things everywhere in Judea. He started in Galilee and now he has come to Jerusalem.’
korean_text: 무리가 더욱 강하게 말하되 그가 온 유대에서 가르치고 갈릴리에서부터 시작하여 여기까지 와서 백성을 소동하게 하나이다

sentences.original_text: But they continued to speak strongly to him.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그들은 계속해서 그에게 강하게 말했습니다.

sentences.original_text: and ready to fight against the government.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 정부에 맞서 싸울 준비를 시킵니다.

sentences.original_text: He has taught these bad things
and now he has come to Jerusalem.'
